name: Readdy
tagline: Websites that stand out, built and published in minutes
description: Build your dream websites by talking with AI - no drag-and-drop needed. When you're happy, publish instantly, or export as clean code or Figma files. Perfect for small teams with limited design resources, or agencies looking to deliver 10x faster.

name: EasyStaff Payroll
tagline: Pay abroad to teams & freelancers with 360° compliance
description: EasyStaff Payroll is a platform for convenient and secure payments to freelancers. With built-in compliance and simplified B2B2C contracts, you can effortlessly pay anyone, anywhere, anytime.

name: Recall Augmented Browsing
tagline: Never wonder where you've seen something before.
description: Ever read something and think, 'I’ve seen this before'—but can’t remember where? Augmented Browsing resurfaces related content from your Recall knowledgebase, turning passive browsing into active discovery. Join 200K+ nerds and elevate how you consume content.

name: Supabase UI Library
tagline: Drop-in components based on shadcn/ui & powered by Supabase
description: A collection of powerful, customizable UI components built on shadcn/ui. Instantly add Supabase Auth forms, Storage uploads, Realtime chat, cursors, and presence indicators, and more to any Next.js, React Router, TanStack Start, or plain React project.

name: Vapi
tagline: Voice AI agents for Developers
description: Voice models sound great—but turning them into voice agents and scaling them reliably is hard. Vapi provides everything needed to build, test, and deploy a voice agent, all the way up to millions of calls. Join the community of 150,000+ developers today.

name: Exponent
tagline: A programming agent that runs anywhere, from local dev to CI
description: Exponent is a highly capable AI agent that collaborates on any software engineering task from exploration to deployment. Early users have been using Exponent to debug Docker, write SQL queries, automate incident response, and much more.

name: doola Business-in-a-Box™ for E-Commerce
tagline: Your E-Commerce back office. Simplified.
description: The ultimate Business-in-a-Box™ solution for E-Commerce entrepreneurs. We handle all the unsexy yet critical back-office tasks, from entity formation and bookkeeping to business analytics and tax filings, so you can focus on growing your dream business.

name: Enigma
tagline: Discover and report UFO/UAP sightings around the world
description: Enigma is a UFO/UAP sighting alerting and reporting platform. Every day, thousands of people see something they can't explain in the skies. Seen something unusual in the sky? Share your UFO sighting story and read accounts from thousands of other witnesses!

name: OpenAI Academy
tagline: Free AI Literacy for Everyone
description: Learn AI with OpenAI Academy, a free online resource hub. Offers workshops, videos, and content for all backgrounds, from basics to advanced topics.

name: Internet.io
tagline: One Platform, Endless Possibilities
description: Do you really trust one AI's answer? Our mission is to empower individuals with reliable AI insights by uniting top AI engines on one platform. We foster innovation through a low-code platform, enabling users to create & share their Agents for the community.

name: Cove AI Apps
tagline: Visual workspace where tools are instantly created for you
description: Cove is a visual workspace for thinking with AI. Now you can create personalized, interactive tools right in your Cove spaces to help on all your projects. Because sometimes the answer you need from AI isn’t just text, it’s an interactive experience.

name: Kozy
tagline: Bolt/Loveable for Video Editing. Quality edits in seconds.
description: Enabling anyone to create professionally edited videos effortlessly. Describe your ideal video edit in plain language. Kozy Studio handles the complex editing work for you. From TikToks to YouTube videos and ads, get high quality edits fast.

name: DreamFlow
tagline: Instantly build Flutter apps from text prompts
description: DreamFlow turns your text prompts into fully-functional Flutter apps in minutes. Powered by FlutterFlow's proven expertise and cutting-edge AI, it's the fastest way to transform ideas into high-quality mobile experiences.

name: NotionMail
tagline: Personalized to your work and designed like Notion
description: Notion Mail blends email with Notion’s powerful tools—custom inbox views, AI-assisted drafting, and deep integration with Notion Calendar and pages—offering a faster, smarter, and more organized way to manage your email.

name: Octomind MCP
tagline: Use vibe testing to repair the damage done by vibe coding
description: Build fast with AI and test just as effortlessly. Octomind turns natural language prompts from your AI-powered interface to end-to-end tests, runs them, analyzes failures, and auto-fixes issues - so your code doesn’t just vibe, it thrives.

name: ElevenLabs Text to Bark
tagline: The world's first AI-powered TTS model for dogs
description: Talk to your dog with our new AI Pawdio engine. Simply type a message, choose your breed, and our models will convert it into fluent barking. 😀

name: MagiCan
tagline: AI-powered Miro-like infinite canvas for visual planning
description: MagiCan is an AI-enhanced infinite canvas platform that revolutionizes collaborative storytelling and project planning for creatives and teams.

name: DGi
tagline: An AI data agent for building dashboards, Apps, & more
description: DGi is an experimental AI agent specialized in data that builds and it is entirely built by AI. It isn’t locked into any fixed front or back end. At its core, it embodies “visual empathy”: we give you a sleek interface to interact visually, not just via chat.

name: Magic Minutes
tagline: AI Summarizer for all platforms like Zoom, Meet, Teams, etc
description: Magic Minutes, Roam’s breakthrough AI Meeting Summarizer, is now available for meetings on all platforms. You’ll get transcriptions and summaries for desktop meetings on Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, WebEx, Ring Central or any other platform.

name: Usercall AI Qualitative Analysis
tagline: Automated user insights from interviews, surveys & more
description: Manually reviewing & tagging user feedback can take days. Usercall's AI Qualitative Analysis automatically identifies themes, sentiments, and patterns in interviews and open responses—uncovering hidden insights while preserving context and nuance

tagline: Websites that stand out, built and published in minutes
